item.description:
Celebrate the Harvest at the
10th Annual Taste! Organic Connecticut

Sunday, September 19, 2010
Manchester Community College
from 10 am to 4 pm

bridie the cowExperience the only LOCAL & ORGANIC festival in Connecticut
offering a farmer's market, fresh prepared food, live music, sustainable vendors, artisans, free workshops and free kids activities!

$7 Admission for non-members
$5 Admission for members
FREE Admission for kids under 12
MCC Students and Faculty enter at the Member price!

CT NOFA has been promoting local, organic agriculture through education and advocacy since 1982.
item.name: CT NOFA TASTE ORGANIC
